data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bray, Rodney A., Cribb, Thomas H. (2007): Holorchis gigas n. sp. (Digenea: Lepocreadiidae) from the yellow-striped sweet-lips Plectorhinchus chrysotaenia (Perciformes: Haemulidae) from Lizard Island, Great Barrier Reef, with observations on Aephnidiogenes major. Zootaxa 1517: 63-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.177356
